r.s: For all those things you.... probably shouldn't have been doing anyway....
r.d: Replace, rename, and remove user defined functions and classes. Define customized superglobal variables for general purpose use. Execute code in restricted environment (sandboxing).
r.n: License was changed to the BSD License (3 Clause) Main bug-fixes: * Building on windows-platform was fixed. * The issue with inheritance of methods, which have been created by the runkit_method_rename function, was fixed. * Fixed dumb bug in workarounds based on php-version.
